name: internet-clock-online
description: Ultimate free online clock with stopwatch, countdown timer, alarm clock, world time zones, and Pomodoro focus timer. The only clock website you'll ever need.

scripts.build-manual: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html *.txt *.xml styles scripts assets dist/ && [ -f dist/Index.html ] && mv dist/Index.html dist/index.html || true
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Files ready for deployment in dist/ directory'
scripts.test-local: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.docker-deploy: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-run

author: TysunM
